Gnosis.short_description: Direct experiential knowledge of spiritual or metaphysical truth.

Episteme.short_description: Scientific or systematic knowledge based on theoretical understanding.

Techne.short_description: Practical knowledge of crafts and applied skills.

Sophia.short_description: Wisdom knowledge integrating theoretical and practical understanding.

Metis.short_description: Cunning intelligence and adaptive knowledge from experience.

Vidya.short_description: Sacred knowledge leading to spiritual liberation.

Jnana.short_description: Pure knowledge of ultimate reality or universal truth.

Paradigm.short_description: Framework of concepts and theories structuring knowledge.

Tradition.short_description: Knowledge transmitted through generations via culture.

Revelation.short_description: Knowledge directly received from divine or higher source.

Empiricism.short_description: Knowledge gained through sensory experience and observation.

Rationalism.short_description: Knowledge derived through reason and logical deduction.

Intuition.short_description: Direct knowing without conscious reasoning process.

Memory.short_description: Stored knowledge from past experience and learning.

Archive.short_description: Collected and preserved knowledge across time.

Doctrine.short_description: Formally organized system of teachings and principles.

Discourse.short_description: Knowledge created and transmitted through language and dialogue.

Praxis.short_description: Knowledge through practical action and application.

Method.short_description: Systematic approach to acquiring and validating knowledge.

Discipline.short_description: Organized field of study with distinct methods and concepts.

Myth.short_description: Narrative knowledge encoding cultural and spiritual truth.

Symbol.short_description: Knowledge encoded in meaningful forms and representations.

Protocol.short_description: Standardized procedures for knowledge acquisition and verification.

Network.short_description: Interconnected system of knowledge nodes and relationships.

Database.short_description: Structured collection of information and relationships.

Pattern.short_description: Recurring structures and relationships in knowledge.

Model.short_description: Simplified representation of complex knowledge relationships.

Corpus.short_description: Body of knowledge within specific domain or tradition.

Wisdom.short_description: Deep understanding integrating knowledge and experience.

Intelligence.short_description: Capacity to acquire and apply knowledge effectively.

Consciousness.short_description: Awareness within which knowledge arises and is known.

Field.short_description: Domain of knowledge with common principles and methods.

System.short_description: Organized whole of interrelated knowledge elements.

Ontology.short_description: Formal specification of knowledge concepts and relationships.
